channel.title: RuneBreeze - A step in the right direction
channel.description:
[ul][center][img]http://i.imgur.com/QM27D.png[/img][/center] [b]What is RuneBreeze?[/b] RuneBreeze is a Runescape Private Server based on RuneSource by blakeman8192. The SVN for RuneSource is here: [url=https://svn.assembla.com/svn/runesource/]https://svn.assembla.com/svn/runesource/[/url]. The purpose of RuneBreeze is to provide a [u]stable[/u], [u]high-performance[/u], and [u]simple[/u] RuneScape server emulator for people to use.
[center][b]Bases I used:[/b] Galkon's 317 Deob RuneSource 1[/center]
[b]What I've done to the souce since the first release by blakeman8192:[/b] [list][li]Fixed Running (button packet) and Equipment Tab.[/li] [li]100% Runecrafting, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Fletching, Cooking, Herblore, Fishing, Crafting, Herblore.[/li] [li]Teleporting with level requirements and also equipment with level requirements.[/li] [li]Eating and Potions(linked with herblore).[/li] [/list]
[b]What I'm going to focus on now:[/b] [list] [li]Combat, this needs to be done.[/li] [li]Finish the skilling base.[/li] [/list]
[b]What I've done to the client since the release by Galkon:[/b] [list] [li]Followed 2 tutorials including clickable links in chatbox.[/li] [li]Edited name and a few other fixes.[/li] [/list]
[b]What I plan on doing:[/b] [list] [li]Background[/li] [li]New login box.[/li] [/list][/ul]
[center][b]Updates:[/b][/center] [code]11/3/11 - Thread was added to Moparscape.[/code] [code]11/4/11 - Minor fixes, nothing really that stands out.[/code] [center][b]Media:[/b][/center] Adding some pictures soon.

item.title: RuneBreeze - A step in the right direction
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

demps2k9:

I guarantee the skills aren’t 100% but good luck.

What I mean by 100% is that it’s perfected. All features are added such as for firemaking. Correct log placement and step back, as well as different timers for different burn times for logs.

Read full topic

item.title: RuneBreeze - A step in the right direction
item.dc:creator: @Stupit Stu
item.description:
@Stupit wrote:

[ul][center][/center]
What is RuneBreeze?
RuneBreeze is a Runescape Private Server based on RuneSource by blakeman8192. The SVN for RuneSource is here: https://svn.assembla.com/svn/runesource/.
The purpose of RuneBreeze is to provide a stable, high-performance, and simple RuneScape server emulator for people to use.

[center]Bases I used:
Galkon’s 317 Deob
RuneSource 1[/center]

What I’ve done to the souce since the first release by blakeman8192:
[list][li]Fixed Running (button packet) and Equipment Tab.[/li]
[li]100% Runecrafting, Woodcutting, Firemaking, Fletching, Cooking, Herblore, Fishing, Crafting, Herblore.[/li]
[li]Teleporting with level requirements and also equipment with level requirements.[/li]
[li]Eating and Potions(linked with herblore).[/li]
[/list]

What I’m going to focus on now:
[list]
[li]Combat, this needs to be done.[/li]
[li]Finish the skilling base.[/li]
[/list]

What I’ve done to the client since the release by Galkon:
[list]
[li]Followed 2 tutorials including clickable links in chatbox.[/li]
[li]Edited name and a few other fixes.[/li]
[/list]

What I plan on doing:
[list]
[li]Background[/li]
[li]New login box.[/li]
[/list][/ul]

[center]Updates:[/center]

[code]11/3/11

  • Thread was added to Moparscape.[/code]

[code]11/4/11

  • Minor fixes, nothing really that stands out.[/code]
    [center]Media:[/center]
    Adding some pictures soon.

Read full topic
item.source: RuneBreeze - A step in the right direction
